page.title: 10Paul's School Day
page.content: My name is Paul Abrahams. Iam nearly 9 and I have two brothers ,Ian and John and one sister Kathryn. I am the oldest and I help my mum and dad . I go to school with my two brothers. I go to Breachwood Green School. On Monday July 1st 1985 I was the last to line up. After the whistle I put my lunch box in the basket and then I changed my shoes.I sat on the carpet and Mrs Thurlby called the register. Then we had news and then I went into Assembly. I sang a hymn. When we went back into the classroom I did my spellings.I did my maths.Soon it was playtime and I played football. Next I wrote a story.Then it was lunchtime. After lunch I played football again. In the afternoon I practised for sports day. I went home at 3.15p.m.
